Package com.univpm.po.NutritionStats.utility

Class InputOutput

java.lang.Object
com.univpm.po.NutritionStats.utility.InputOutput
public class InputOutput extends Object
InputOutput's purpose is to work between primary (RAM) and secondary (HDD/SSD) memory to execute tasks like :

•Write a file to disk,

•Read a file from disk,

•Check if a file exists,

•List all the files inside a directory.

This class is instantiated almost everywhere inside the project.

      Method used to write provided text inside a file.
      Parameters:
      text - the text to write inside the file.
      append - an optional variable (varargs) which decide if overwrite or append the file in case it already exists
